duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and maintain cloud infrastructure and DevOps pipeline using core AWS services and coding with Python or Java or C++.
Support automation needs of multiple teams, systems, and products.
Deliver software development and software builds and releases, including design, development, and support of builds, scripts, and installation procedures.
Optimize and redesign company’s Cloud infrastructure and DevOps pipeline, leveraging tools like GIT, Jenkins/CircleCI/Travis, and other core AWS services.
Work with relational databases, query authoring, and familiarity with a variety of databases.
Communicate the logic behind technical decisions to non-tech stakeholders.
Travel within the U.S. and provide support to end clients across multiple states.

education_certification.credential: Degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Electrical Engineering, Mathematics, or equivalent quantitative field
